name: n8n-nodes-base.urlScanIoTool
semantic_context: Provides various utilities for monitoring websites like health checks or screenshots

descriptionType.name: descriptionType

options.name: Set Automatically
options.description: Automatically set based on resource and operation

descriptionType.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

toolDescription.name: toolDescription
toolDescription.default: Provides various utilities for monitoring websites like health checks or screenshots
toolDescription.description: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often
toolDescription.ai_hint: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often

resource.name: resource
resource.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

operation.name: operation
operation.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

scanId.name: scanId
scanId.description: ID of the scan to retrieve
scanId.ai_hint: ID of the scan to retrieve

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.ai_hint: Max number of results to return

filters.name: filters

options.name: query
options.description: Query using the Elastic Search Query String syntax. See supported fields in the documentation.

filters.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

url.name: url
url.ai_hint: 必须包含协议头 (http:// 或 https://)。支持表达式注入。

additionalFields.name: additionalFields

options.name: customAgent
options.description: User-Agent header to set for this scan. Defaults to n8n

options.name: overrideSafety
options.description: Disable reclassification of URLs with potential PII in them

options.name: referer
options.description: HTTP referer to set for this scan

options.name: tags
options.description: Comma-separated list of user-defined tags to add to this scan. Limited to 10 tags.

additionalFields.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

conditional_rules: IF resource == 'scan' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'scanId'
IF resource == 'scan' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF resource == 'scan' AND operation == 'getAll' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'scan' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'filters'
IF resource == 'scan' AND operation == 'perform' THEN SHOW parameter 'url'
IF resource == 'scan' AND operation == 'perform' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
